tspan.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:bold;font-stretch:normal;font-size:50px;line-height:1.25;font-family:'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono';-inkscape-font-specification:'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono Bold';fill:#fdfdfd;fill-opacity:1

text.tspan: Number, 1 bit flip away from a pointer
